name: vue-smoothie
description: üçπ Next-gen native smooth scrolling component library for Vue 3
author: ZEOKKU <contact@zeokku.com>

scripts.create-entry: echo export { Smoothie } from './smoothie'; export { Smoothie as OmniSmoothie } from './omniSmoothie' > ./dist_lib/index.js
scripts.build-lib: cross-env __OMNI="" vite build --mode lib && cross-env __OMNI=1 vite build --mode lib && npm run create-entry
scripts.build-all: npm run build-lib && npm run build-demo
